docs.snippet: U.S. sales of new cars and trucks hit a record high in 2016, automakers said on Wednesday, and investors bid up shares in the sector as strong consumer confidence and relatively low fuel prices bolstered the industry's outlook....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. sales of new cars and trucks hit a record high in 2016, automakers said on Wednesday, and investors bid up shares in the sector as strong consumer confidence and relatively low fuel prices bolstered the industry's outlook.

headline.main: U.S. December Auto Sales Surprisingly Strong, 2016 Sets New High
headline.print_headline: U.S. December Auto Sales Surprisingly Strong, 2016 Sets New High

docs.snippet: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump on Wednesday warned fellow Republicans to "be careful" over their effort to repeal U.S. Democratic President Barack Obama's signature healthcare law, urging conservatives not to let the pressure off Democrats....

docs.snippet: A new Kansas congressman is dishing out discipline after his 17-year-old son pulled a dance move resembling a sneeze during a photo shoot with House Speaker Paul Ryan after the House swearing-in ceremony in Washington....

docs.snippet: Jurors in the death penalty trial of a man convicted of carjacking and killing two Massachusetts men in 2001 were shown gruesome photos of his victims while a prosecutor described how they were stabbed over and over while begging for their lives....

docs.snippet: The European Union spends about $1 billion a year on services related to its 24 official languages. Some want to add Turkish — and perhaps drop English....
